author: chris-dollin
msg: Changed the name and meaning of the Statement.set() methods to
Statement.changeObject() methods that deliver a new Statement object
rather than updating the existing one.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Re-expressed SimpleQueryHandler::containsNode() in terms of grap.contain().
This exposed bug in GraphMem.contains(), which got fixed.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Improved the implementation of ModelCom::containsResource() by deferring
it to the QueryHandler, which has an opportunity to be efficient.

author: jeremy_carroll
msg: Changing to do more work at runtime.

author: chris-dollin
msg: In pursuit of "[ 689943 ] containsResource()", added containsResource()
to Model and hence ModelCom, driven by new TestContains class. Adding
TestContains forced a refactoring of methods out of TestSimpleListStatements,
into new ModelTestBase over new JenaTestBase [with assertFalse/Differ]. This
allows GraphTestBase to be built over JenaTestBase with minor consequent
